title: STAT+: Trump administration proposes Medicare pilots to lower drug prices on par with peer countries
description: The experiments would cut the prices of some drugs to bring them in line with what other countries pay, saving Medicare billions.
content: The experiments would cut the prices of some drugs to bring them in line with what other countries pay, saving Medicare billions.
